      • canMoveFromTo

        public boolean canMoveFromTo​(int spot1X,
                             int spot1Y,
                             int spot2X,
                             int spot2Y,
                             int nMoves)
                      throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Tells you if a player in spot1 can move to spot2 with a certain amount of moves
        Parameters:
        spot1X - spot 1 X coord
        spot1Y - spot 1 Y coord
        spot2X - spot 2 X coord
        spot2Y - spot 2 Y coord
        nMoves - How many moves the player can use
        Returns:
        true if the player can move from spot1 to spot2 in nMoves
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

        nMoves - the moves that player can do

      • movePlayerToColorSpawn

        public void movePlayerToColorSpawn​(java.lang.String player,
                                   Color discardedColor)
        RESPAWN METHOD! this method is called by the game in the method respawn and it moves the player to the spawnspot of the same color as the discarded powerup
        Parameters:
        player - the player that has to respawn
        discardedColor - the color of the spawnspot
